About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Biography

I am a hardworking, talented, ambitious and dedicated front end developer with a masters degree in musicology. After completing the undergraduate studies of musicology at the Academy of Arts in Novi Sad, I began the program of retraining in IT. My goal is to constantly work on improving my programming skills, so that sometimes in future I can connect my two major interests - programming and music.
In my spare time I explore and read about healthy life, veganism and ecology. I love music, animals and nature.

Technologies:

Collaboration with PetMe Startup

Front End Developer

PetMe is an innovative platform that aims to accommodate as many pets as possible, reduce the number of stray animals and assist asylum and other organizations dealing with this problem.
This platform symbolizes humanity and serves as proof that everyone can help change the system and create better living conditions - both for the animals and the people.

10 days 10 websites challenge

Front End Developer

New challenges are very important for both personal and professional growth.
Challenges force us to grow our consciousness and become more evolved and enlightened.
In this challenge, I challenged myself to build 10 websites in 10 days using html5, css3 and javascript technologies. All websites are responsive and follow the mobile first rule.
